001package net.tvburger.jdl.mlp;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.ActivationsCachedNeuron;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.DefaultNeuralNetwork;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.InputNeuron;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.ActivationFunction;
008
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.List;
011
012public class MultiLayerPerceptron extends DefaultNeuralNetwork {
013
014    public static MultiLayerPerceptron create(ActivationFunction outputActivationFunction, ActivationFunction hiddenActivationFunction, int... depth) {
015        List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers = new ArrayList<>();
016        for (int d = 0; d < depth.length; d++) {
017            if (d == 0) {
018                List<Neuron> inputNeurons = new ArrayList<>();
019                for (int i = 0; i < depth[d]; i++) {
020                    inputNeurons.add(new InputNeuron("Input(" + i + ")"));
021                }
022                layers.add(inputNeurons);
023            } else {
024                List<Neuron> layerNeurons = new ArrayList<>();
025                List<? extends Neuron> previousLayer = layers.getLast();
026                for (int i = 0; i < depth[d]; i++) {
027                    String name;
028                    ActivationFunction activationFunction;
029                    if (depth.length == d + 1) {
030                        name = "Output";
031                        activationFunction = outputActivationFunction;
032                    } else {
033                        name = "Hidden";
034                        activationFunction = hiddenActivationFunction;
035                    }
036                    layerNeurons.add(ActivationsCachedNeuron.create(name + "(" + layers.size() + "," + i + ")", previousLayer, activationFunction));
037                }
038                layers.add(layerNeurons);
039            }
040        }
041        return new MultiLayerPerceptron(layers);
042    }
043
044    private MultiLayerPerceptron(List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers) {
045        super(layers);
046    }
047
048}
